name: Dionne Crossbody Purse
description: A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here.
full_text: A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here . An ode to an iconic character of the 90s, the Dionne Crossbody Purse embodies a flirty date night vibe and uses only 1 skein of yarn for a quick and satisfying project! Shop the yarn here . FINISHED DIMENSIONS Diameter: 9”/23cm Circumference: 28.25”/72cm Depth: 8”/20cm DIFFICULTY LEVEL Easy SKILLS Knitting Purling Working in the round K2tog decrease All patterns are written in standard US terms. Sign up for info on special offers, sales, and new pattern releases: bit.ly/TOWnewsletter CONNECT Instagram: @twoofwands Facebook: facebook.com/twoofwands Pinterest: pinterest.com/twoofwandsknits Youtube: youtube.com/twoofwandsknits HELP Join the Crew of Wands Facebook group to connect with other makers of Two of Wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions. SELLING FINISHED ITEMS Small batch sales of finished pieces made from this pattern are permitted, but seller must use their own photographs and credit must be given to Two of Wands as the designer. The pattern and photographs of this design are the property of Two of Wands and are for personal, non-commercial use only.
